doc:
Paul Guilfoyle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Guilfoyle 0 Paul Vincent Guilfoyle (; born April 28, 1949) is an American television and film actor. He was a regular cast member of the CBS police drama CSI: Crime Scene Investigation where he played Captain Jim Brass from 2000 to 2014 and returned for the series finale, "Immortality", in 2015. Paul_Vincent_Guilfoyle ( ; born April_28_,_1949 ) is an_American_television_and_film_actor . He was a_regular_cast_member of the_CBS_police_drama_CSI : Crime_Scene_Investigation where he played Captain_Jim_Brass from 2000 to 2014 and returned for the_series_finale , " Immortality " , in 2015 .
